description: Scheduled but date and time are not known
Suspended by referee's decision, may be rescheduled another day
Interrupted by referee's decision, should resume in a few minutes
Finished after extra time without penalty shootout
Postponed to another day; once the new date/time is known status becomes NS
Cancelled, match will not be played
Abandoned (weather, safety, floodlights, staff/referees); may or may not be rescheduled
In-progress fixture without half-time or elapsed data available
